channel.title: IRC channel problems
channel.description: Every time I try to play on an irc.(yada yada yada).net/org/etc. it says "Unexpected server response, please try a different world." Why is this happening? This has only happened when I try to connect to an IRC server... and they are always top on the server list, so I want to play on one.

item.title: IRC channel problems
item.dc:creator: @Kingturd Kingturd
item.description:
@Kingturd wrote:

Ok, now we let this die down… By the way, it may be stupid, but I aint even 12 yet, so… Ah screw it, not gonna save myself here. Lets just put this to bed now, ok?

Read full topic

item.title: IRC channel problems
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Kingturd:

Every time I try to play on an irc.(yada yada yada).net/org/etc. it says “Unexpected server response, please try a different world.” Why is this happening? This has only happened when I try to connect to an IRC server… and they are always top on the server list, so I want to play on one.

I almost lol’d. But didn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC channel problems
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Yes. If you want, you can use the proper IRC client. http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php

And don’t call me uptight. If I were being uptight right now, you would be dead.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC channel problems
item.dc:creator: @Kingturd Kingturd
item.description:
@Kingturd wrote:

Dont have to be so uptight about it… I aint that old you know… I dont even know what an IRC is… Isnt it like a chat system thingy?

Read full topic

item.title: IRC channel problems
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

IRC isn’t RS servers. You can’t join IRC channels using the MoparScape client. Please learn the difference between a server and a client before you do anything else on this forum.

Read full topic
